description: Portfolio case for a series of nine etchings, Das Gesicht (The Face), published by Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924; blue-green case with a tan leather binding and an off-white paper cover housing nine color etchings and a title page; on the cover of the portfolio in thick black cursive script: Gramatté [followed by a long vertical curing line] 1924.
inscription: LRC of front cover, in pencil: Eigendrucke | center of back cover, on piece of green tape: 855
portfolio: From Das Gesicht (The Face), Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924
title: Portfolio case for Das Gesicht (The Face)
